varselforgroenland.name: Warning for Greenlandic seaareas
varselforgroenland.text:
There is storm warning for Daneborg, Kangikajik.
There is gale warning for Aputiteeq, Kulusuk, Timmiarmiut, Nunap Isuata Kangia, Nunap Isuata Kitaa, Narsalik, Meqquitsoq, Attu and Uiffaq.
There is warning of ice accretion for Daneborg, Kangikajik, Meqquitsoq, Attu, Uiffaq.

gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast valid to Wednesday the 25. November, 06 UTC.

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: A low, 970 hPa, northeast of Iceland, is moving slowly towards eastnortheast. A low, 997 hPa, over southern Meqquitsoq, is moving towards northeast filling. A low, 993 hPa, a little west of New Foundland, is moving towards northnortheast and is expected this night over Nunarsuit.

udsigtfordaneborg.name: Forecast for Daneborg
udsigtfordaneborg.text:
Around north, 15 to 23 m/s, in southeastern part up to storm, 25 m/s, from this afternoon or evening north and northwest, decreasing to gale, 13 to 20 m/s, strongest in eastern part. In eastern part locally snow with moderate to poor visibility, otherwise good visibility.
Locally risk of ice accretion.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 8 m. Swells: 3,5 m.

icedaneborg.name: Ice_Daneborg
icedaneborg.text: Old ice and thin first-year ice in the western and central part. Few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforkangikajik.name: Forecast for Kangikajik
udsigtforkangikajik.text:
Gale around north, 15 to 23 m/s, in northeastern part locally storm 25 m/s, from this afternoon or evening decreasing and in eastern part north and northwest, 13 to 20 m/s, in western part between northwest and northeast, 5 to 13 m/s, later variable, below 8 m/s. Mainly good visibility.
Locally risk of ice accretion.

waveskangikajik.name: Waves Kangikajik
waveskangikajik.text: Significant wave height: 9 m. Swells: 4 m.

icekangikajik.name: Ice_Kangikajik
icekangikajik.text: Old ice and thin first-year ice in the western part. Few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforaputiteeq.name: Forecast for Aputiteeq
udsigtforaputiteeq.text: Variable, 5 to 13 m/s, locally gale 15 m/s, from this night a little decreasing. Especially in northern part rain, sleet, or snow with moderate to poor visibility, otherwise mainly good visibility.

wavesaputiteeq.name: Waves Aputiteeq
wavesaputiteeq.text: Significant wave height: 5 m. Swells: 4 m.

iceaputiteeq.name: Ice_Aputiteeq
iceaputiteeq.text: Old ice and young ice in the western part along the coast and in the northern part. Many icebergs and growlers in the western part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforkulusuk.name: Forecast for Kulusuk
udsigtforkulusuk.text: Up to gale around west, 10 to 18 m/s, decreasing to 5 to 13 m/s, from this evening variable, below 8 m/s. Good visibility, from this evening in southeastern part locally rain or sleet with mainly moderate visibility.

waveskulusuk.name: Waves Kulusuk
waveskulusuk.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 3,5 m.

icekulusuk.name: Ice_Kulusuk
icekulusuk.text: New ice in the western part along the coast. Many icebergs and growlers in the western part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfortimmiarmiut.name: Forecast for Timmiarmiut
udsigtfortimmiarmiut.text: In northwesternmost part variable, below 8 m/s, otherwise up to gale from southwest, 10 to 18 m/s, decreasing from this evening southwest and south, 8 to 13 m/s. Rain, sleet or snow from south with mainly visibility.

wavestimmiarmiut.name: Waves Timmiarmiut
wavestimmiarmiut.text: Significant wave height: 5 m. Swells: 3,5 m.

icetimmiarmiut.name: Ice_Timmiarmiut
icetimmiarmiut.text: New ice in the western part along the coast. Few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kangia
udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.text: Gale from southwest, 13 to 18 m/s, from this afternoon southwest and south, decreasing to 10 to 15 m/s. In western part rain or sleet with mainly moderate visibility, otherwise mainly good visibility.

waveskangia.name: Waves Nunap Isuata Kangia
waveskangia.text: Significant wave height: 5 m. Swells: 3,5 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kitaa
udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.text: In westernmost part variable, below 8 m/s, otherwise southwest and south, 8 to 13 m/s, locally up to gale, 15 m/s. Rain or sleet with moderate to poor visibility.

waveskitaa.name: Waves Isuata Kitaa
waveskitaa.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 3,5 m.

udsigtfornunarsuit.name: Forecast for Nunarsuit
udsigtfornunarsuit.text: Variable, below 8 m/s, from this evening in eastern part mainly south and southeast, 5 to 13 m/s, and in western part north and northwest, increasing to 8 to 13 m/s. Widespread rain, sleet or snow with moderate to poor visibility.

wavesnunarsuit.name: Waves Nunarsuit
wavesnunarsuit.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 3,5 m.

udsigtfornarsalik.name: Forecast for Narsalik
udsigtfornarsalik.text: Gradually around north, 3 to 8 m/s, from this evening increasing to 8 to 13 m/s, and this night locally gale, 15 m/s, from north and northwest. In southeastern part locally snow or sleet with moderate to poor visibility, otherwise mainly good visibility.

wavesnarsalik.name: Waves Narsalik
wavesnarsalik.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtformeqquitsoq.name: Forecast for Meqquitsoq
udsigtformeqquitsoq.text: Gradually around north, increasing to 8 to 13 m/s, from this evening locally gale, 15 m/s, from north and northwest. A few snow showers, otherwise good visibility. Locally risk of ice accretion.

wavesmeqquitsoq.name: Waves Meqquitsoq
wavesmeqquitsoq.text: Significant wave height: 3,5 m. Swells: 2,5 m.

udsigtforattu.name: Forecast for Attu
udsigtforattu.text:
Up to gale from north and northwest, 10 to 15 m/s, in eastern part transiently variable, below 8 m/s. Locally snow or snow showers, otherwise good visibility.
Locally risk of ice accretion.

wavesattu.name: Waves Attu
wavesattu.text: Significant wave height: 3 m. Swells: 2 m.

iceattu.name: Ice_Attu
iceattu.text: New ice and young ice in the western part. Few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforuiffaq.name: Forecast for Uiffaq
udsigtforuiffaq.text:
North becoming northwest, 8 to 13 m/s, in southern part locally gale 15 m/s. Snow showers, otherwise good visibility.
Locally risk of ice accretion.

wavesuiffaq.name: Waves Uiffaq
wavesuiffaq.text: Significant wave height: 3 m. Swells: 2 m.

iceuiffaq.name: Ice_Uiffaq
iceuiffaq.text: New ice and young ice in the western part. Many icebergs and growlers in the northeastern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.name: Forecast for Qimusseriarsuaq
udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.text: Northwest and north, 3 to 8 m/s, and in southern part up to 10 m/s. Especially in southeastern part snow showers, otherwise good visibility.

wavesqimusseriarsuaq.name: Waves Qimusseriarsuaq
wavesqimusseriarsuaq.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1 m.

iceqimusseriarsuaq.name: Ice_Qimusseriarsuaq
iceqimusseriarsuaq.text: Young ice and thin first-year ice in the western and northern part. Many icebergs and growlers in the eastern part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforkiatak.name: Forecast for Kiatak
udsigtforkiatak.text: Variable, below 6 m/s and mainly good visibility.

waveskiatak.name: Waves Kiatak
waveskiatak.text: Significant wave height: nil. Swells: nil.

icekiatak.name: Ice_Kiatak
icekiatak.text: Young ice and thin first-year ice. Few icebergs and growlers.
